dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
L. Bottou
Y. Bengio
P. Haffner
dcterms:description: A domain generalization benchmark created by colorizing digits and the backgrounds of the MNIST dataset. It consists of images of handwritten digits from 0 to 9, with different digit colors and background colors.
dcterms:title: ccMNIST

dcterms:creator: K. Karkkainen
J. Joo
dcterms:description: A dataset that contains a balanced representation of different racial groups, including images from seven racial categories. It is used for bias measurement and mitigation in face attribute classification.
dcterms:title: FairFace

dcterms:creator: B. Thomee
D. A. Shamma

K. Ni
D. Poland
D. Borth
L.-J. Li
dcterms:description: An image dataset created by Yahoo Labs, randomly selected from the YFCC100M dataset, containing images categorized by year ranges and tagged with indoor/outdoor labels.
dcterms:title: YFCC100M-FDG

dcterms:description: A real-world dataset on policing in New York City, documenting pedestrian stops and whether they involved weapon possession, with a focus on racial bias.
dcterms:title: NYSF
